labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: The dialog box closes and reopens, and for everytime you press enter, once you've stopped pressing enter and start clicking OKAY it doesn't work. E.g. 3x Enter = 6x dialog (3x enter causing another box + 3x clicking open another box) before it'll work.
data.short_description: When deleting a role, pressing <enter> closes and reopens the dialog, but doesn't delete the role.
data.steps_to_repro: - Find a role that you want/can delete with Administrator privelages - Click on Delete - Press Enter on the dialog
